Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/59th
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via due to, a street blockage near Halsted/59th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, 55th, Racine, 63rd, and resume normal route on Halsted, due to a street blockage near Halsted/59th.

Allow extra travel time.
